name: Restitched
storyline: A 2.5D puzzle-platformer featuring a robust level editor, character customization, an engaging story mode, and a charming crafty aesthetic. Restitched focuses on a teddy bear named 'Stuffy' on a journey to find their roots and "restitch" a community unraveled by corporate greed and tyranny.
summary: A 2.5D puzzle-platformer featuring a robust level editor, expansive character customization, an engaging story mode, and a charming crafty aesthetic. Restitched follows the story of a brave, adventurous teddy bear named Stuffy on a journey to find their roots. Along the way, Stuffy must 'restitch' a community unraveled by corporate greed and tyranny while discovering new friends, new foes, and new locations.
